resources.string: Welcome to our Strawberry Ripeness Detection App!
Distinguish your strawberries with a click
This image recognition application allows you to use your camera to scan your strawberries to determine if it is ripe or unripe
Upload images of strawberries from your device’s gallery that will be used for detection
Add images of strawberries to the training model and label their ripeness status (will process verification) for further accuracy
This image classification model was trained using PyTorch.
Identify your fruits with their nutritional values!
Display nutritional facts and health benefits of the fruit scanned
